attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the future of Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No more spin. We should be allowed a vote. Do we want in or out. If we want out then thats it. If we want in then there should be a big debate on how we want to be in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
